title.rendered: STEDI SINGLE BATTERY 4X4 VOLT METER GAUGE MONITOR

content.rendered:
Single Battery Monitor

OVERVIEW

Coming Soon.

APPLICATION

DETAILS

Single 12v Battery Gauge

  • BLUE LED Display
  • Perfect for Single Battery Setups
  • Gauge has 360 degree rotation for vertical and horizontal mounting
  • Dispaly Range 0 to 30 Volts
  • Flush mounted

Key Measurements

  • Gauge Diameter 36mm

SPECIFICATIONS

DC Voltage Gauge

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

Single Battery Volt Gauge
